name: Child of Norn
description:
A game about the child of prophecy, who is destined to save the world, with the help of a legendary, magical axe.

Child of Norn is a linear open-world action-platformer set in the ancient forest lands of the Nordic coast. Here we find Frida, a brave and valiant Norse woman with gifts from the gods themselves, and her magical axe. Join Frida on her journey as you overcome obstacles and forge a new path to dispel the mischief cursing the World Tree. With her extraordinary free-run skills and ability to control nature, and her axe’s abilities, together there is nothing that can stand in the way.

Credits:

Tristian Diaz — Lead Programmer
Zachary Kolibas — Lead Level Design, Environmental Artist
Brian Perez — Level Design, Game Design, UI Design
Daniel Gurrieri — Level Design
Brianna Matheson — Asset Manager
